pkgmetadata.longdescription: Learning with Data on Riemannian Manifolds // We provide a variety of algorithms for manifold-valued data, including Frchet summaries, hypothesis testing, clustering, visualization, and other learning tasks. See Bhattacharya and Bhattacharya (2012) doi:10.1017/CBO9781139094764 for general exposition to statistics on manifolds.
